WorkItem.Description:
Environment

2> SQL Sample: 90728
 
Repro Steps
===========
1> launch DB installer to setup DB
2> Follow wizard until Select Instance
3> Select the instances and then click Next
 
Expectation
===========
At 3rd step, the user can select one local instance
 
Actually
===========
There is no OLAP instance option
Please take a look the attached picture: InstallDB_KJ_Error.jpg
WorkItem.Summary: Installer: With KJ, the DB installer can't find the local OLAP instance.

Comments.Message: We need to take this bug for KJ Samples work.
